abstract: Before Comcast can transform the entertainment business by taking control of NBC Universal, it must convince Washington that the plan won’t hurt rivals and consumers. So far, it has failed to impress.
snippet: Before Comcast can transform the entertainment business by taking control of NBC Universal, it must convince Washington that the plan won’t hurt rivals and consumers. So far, it has failed to impress.
lead_paragraph: Before Comcast can transform the entertainment business by taking control of NBC Universal, it must convince Washington that the plan won’t hurt rivals and consumers. And the promises the cable company has made so far don’t impress opponents who want federal regulators to attach strict conditions to the deal, The Associated Press writes.

headline.main: To Get NBC, Comcast Still Has Persuading to Do

abstract: The Justice Department approved the merger of Live Nation and Ticketmaster Entertainment, but imposed several conditions on the deal that Assistant Attorney General Christine Varney said would have the effect of lowering ticket prices.
snippet: The Justice Department approved the merger of Live Nation and Ticketmaster Entertainment, but imposed several conditions on the deal that Assistant Attorney General Christine Varney said would have the effect of lowering ticket prices.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department approved the merger of Live Nation and Ticketmaster Entertainment on Monday, but it imposed several conditions on the deal that Assistant Attorney General Christine Varney said would have the effect of lowering ticket prices.

headline.main: U.S. Clears Ticketmaster Deal With Conditions
